name: Applin
description: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.

abilities.name: Ripen
abilities.description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
